trans-unit.source: Enable user settings:If enabled, backend users can select in the user settings which fields are available when using the "Edit all" buttons under "List" → "Localization overview". If not empty, the backend user selection overrides the TSconfig setting `tx_l10ntableextended.replaceColumnsList`.
Select which fields are available when using the "Edit all" buttons under "List" → "Localization overview".
